Repo containing the code to generate charts in PACTA executive summary document.

## Installation

You can install the development version of pacta.executive.summary from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("RMI-PACTA/pacta.executive.summary")
```
